title: Instalando o Visual Studio Code
type: book
weight: 2
---

Acesse https://code.visualstudio.com e clique em *Download for Windows*:

![](/courses/git-for-windows/img/vscode-001.png)

<br>

Clique em *Run*:

![](/courses/git-for-windows/img/vscode-002.png)

<br>

Aceite os termos da licensa e clique em *Next*:

![](/courses/git-for-windows/img/vscode-003.png)

<br>

Clique em *Next*:

![](/courses/git-for-windows/img/vscode-005.png)

<br>

Clique em *Next*:

![](/courses/git-for-windows/img/vscode-006.png)

<br>

Habilite a criação do ícone no desktop e clique em *Next*:

![](/courses/git-for-windows/img/vscode-007.png)

<br>

Clique em *Install*:

![](/courses/git-for-windows/img/vscode-008.png)

<br>

Desabilite a opção *Launch Visual Studio Code* e clique em *Finish*:

![](/courses/git-for-windows/img/vscode-009.png)
